description: [Water Curupira Pikabot Distribution](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0037) requires users to interact with malicious attachments in order to start [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) installation.(Citation: TrendMicro Pikabot 2024)
